DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study identify brentuximab vedotin drug-drug interaction patient CD30-positive cancer determine main route excretion . The study also assess blood drug level patient renal hepatic impairment ( special population ) .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Pharmacology Study Brentuximab Vedotin ( SGN-35 )
DOC.criteria: Adequate organ function ( Special Populations : serum bilirubin > 2 mg/dL creatinine clearance < 50 mL/min ) ECOG performance status < 2 ( Special Populations : < 4 ) Relapsed refractory CD30positive malignancy Receiving prohibit medication within 4 week Poor liver function ( ChildPugh class C ) Current diagnosis primary cutaneous ALCL Acute chronic graftversushost disease
